title: Project Proposals for the year 2011/2012
decision_details:
- the proposal made by Hon. S.B. 	Dissanayake, Minister of Higher Education, to implement the following 	projects pertaining to the Universities of Peradeniya, Kelaniya and Colombo, 	was approved by the Cabinet: 

*	proposed  Clinical Research and Services Laboratory, Faculty of Medicine, University of Peradeniya - this will be a 2 storied building costing Rs.50.8 million; 

*	proposed Gymnasium, University of Kelaniya - this will include an Indoor Sports Centre  and the total cost is Rs.50 million; and,

*	construction of the 4th floor to the University of Colombo School of Computing Building Complex - the cost of the project is Rs.57 million.
